abstract: As it looks to shore up its books, Spain's Grupo Santander announced a deal to sell a 35 percent stake in its American automotive financing unit to a group of private equity firms.
snippet: As it looks to shore up its books, Spain's Grupo Santander announced a deal to sell a 35 percent stake in its American automotive financing unit to a group of private equity firms.
lead_paragraph: Spain's Grupo Santander, the euro zone's largest bank by market capitalization, announced a $1.15 billion deal on Friday to sell a 35 percent stake in its automotive financing unit in the United States to a group of private equity investors, as it looks to shore up its balance sheet.

headline.main: Santander to Sell Stake in U.S. Auto Financing Group
